claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Left side shows a table of contents listing sections of an MMWR influenza vaccine recommendations document; right side shows text about CDC adoption of ACIP recommendations and a list of CDC editorial and production staff. does not support the claim because the image contains only a contents page and procedural text about ACIP recommendations, with no mention of cell- or egg-based vaccine production mutations or impacts on effectiveness. Note: Image is clear and legible; no relevant vaccine mutation information is present.
